title: An Odd Problem

embed.description: Post with 2 views. Shared by Powpo2. Help me

body: Okay so I have an odd problem. I don't have my email verified on this account, so I am unable to login to support.riotgames.com to attempt to delete this account. This is one of my smurfs that I have never used so don't find the need for it anymore. So, i'm kinda stuck here and need help lol. Thanks.

replies.body: if you need an account deleted, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once our account team can verify you as the original creator they can then proceed with getting the account taken care of!

That's precisely the problem. I cant login to submit a ticket because my account is unverified, and I am unable to verify my email, so I can't login to change my email.

So I'm stuck in a loop here.

You should still be able to submit a ticket even when you're not signed into your account. When you're on this [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) page, make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account". That will let you create a ticket to our account team.
